author: senh
title: Rogue River stuck in Blossom Bar (I'd rather be in Philadelphia, too)
text: BING NEWS: Rogue River stuck in Blossom Bar (I'd rather be in Philadelphia, too) W.C. Fields had it right! It would have been better to be in Philadelphia. That was the first thought I had on Wednesday, July 15, when I showed up late morning on foot hiking the trail to photograph the rafting action at Blossom Bar, the classic rapids of ... 07/25/2015 - 2:03 am | View Link Blossom Bar Huge waves sprang up with a whoosh in front of a large rock that stuck out in the middle of the river ... to the boat), I know I will never forget my adventure on the Rogue River, at a rapid called Blossom Bar. 07/19/2015 - 12:08 pm | View Link Blossom Bar rapids have taken seven lives in seven years High numbers on the river is certainly a factor. Although floating the wild Rogue requires ... options before you're stuck on the (Picket Fence). And that's where things go sideways." Of the seven fatal accidents at Blossom Bar, six have been a direct ... 05/7/2015 - 1:00 pm | View Link SC man dies rafting on Oregon river (AP) -- A South Carolina man has died after falling in the Rogue River when his raft got stuck in a rapid ... Hoyer of Spartanburg died Friday at Blossom Bar, a Class IV rapid in the wild section of the popular whitewater river.
